programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: An archeology expert joins an Indian professor to look for a lost treasure of India. However, things take a dangerous turn when they are ambushed in their quest.

programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: Isabelle plans to marry a stranger to break a family curse, which leads every first marriage to end in a divorce, in order to get married to her long-time boyfriend Pierre.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: An exiled squirrel plans to rob a nut store to provide food for his former colony. Unfortunately, the store is also a front for bank robbers.

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: After a night of wild partying, two strangers awake and find they have married each other.

programme.title: Love Is in the Air
programme.desc: Antonie and Julie, past lovers, coincidently find themselves seated next to each other on a flight. As conversation ensues, past memories are revived, as they strive to understand each other again.

programme.title: Fun With Dick and Jane
programme.desc: When Dicks employer goes bankrupt, he and his wife, Jane, go broke and look for ways to make ends meet. Eventually, they resort to crime and decide to rob a crooked CEO to get their money back.

programme.title: Legally Blonde
programme.desc: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority girl, enrols in Harvard Law School to win back her ex-boyfriend. Despite initial struggles, she discovers her true potential and excels in her studies.

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After an embaressing defeat, a street dancer, Ash, assembles the best dancers from all across the world for another around against the Invincible crew.

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: A father is forced to conceal his true identity after his son announces his surprise engagement to the daughter of a conservative family.

programme.title: Max
programme.desc: Max, a military dog, returns to the United States after a traumatic experience in Afghanistan. However, his handlers family adopt him and strive to help him recover.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

programme.title: The Gold Rush
programme.desc: During the Klondike Gold Rush, a lone prospector goes through a series of misfortunes, including a blizzard and starvation. However, he finds love even in the stormy Alaska.

programme.desc: Keith Michaels, an Oscar-winning writer, teaches at the Binghamton University on the East Coast after losing his popularity in Hollywood and falls in love with Holly, a fellow teacher.

programme.title: 50 First Dates

programme.desc: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: Mark Watney is stranded on the planet of Mars after his crew leaves him behind, presuming him to be dead due to a storm. With minimum supplies, Mark struggles to keep himself alive.

programme.title: Die Hard 3
programme.desc: Detective John McClane plays a twisted game with a terrorist known only as Simon, who threatens to detonate bombs across New York City if John does not comply with his demands.

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: A Chinese special forces unit must rescue their fellow citizens in the country of Yewaire on the Arabian Peninsula amidst violent coup and threats from a terrorist group.

programme.title: The Adventurers
programme.desc: A legendary detective tries to prevent three thieves from pulling off the heist of a lifetime.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A young motorbike rider must master his newfound powers to confront the emergence of centuries-old enemy forces and settle a 3000-year-old battle.

programme.title: King Of Serpant
programme.desc: A mans small village faces certain death unless he kills a giant python. So, he leads the hunt against the beast to keep his village safe.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: Tarzan, a feral orphan raised by gorillas, encounters a beautiful woman named Jane. As he grows close to her, he faces a difficult choice between staying with his ape family and rejoining humanity.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Riley moves to San Francisco, leaving behind her life in Minnesota. She and her five core emotions, Fear, Anger, Joy, Disgust and Sadness, struggle to cope with her new life.

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: A professor wishes to create a new source of energy that will save his college from being shut down. However, he ends up with an extremely bouncy rubber-like substance that helps objects jump higher.

programme.title: Race to Witch Mountain
programme.desc: A cab driver takes the help of a UFO expert in order to protect two children, who have paranormal powers from falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: After Maggie is thrown out of the house by her step-mother and has a fallout with her elder sister, she discovers that she has a maternal grandmother.

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: Blu, a domesticated blue macaw, is brought to Rio de Janeiro to meet Jewel, the last known female of his species. However, things take a turn when they are kidnapped by smugglers.

programme.title: The Princess Diaries
programme.desc: An awkward American teens life changes when she learns she is the princess of a small European country and must quickly master the ways of royalty.

programme.title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: A princess faces a new difficulty when her coronation is contained by a cunning archduke sighting the rules that contain her from becoming a queen due to her marital status.

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: A girl disguises as a male warrior and joins the imperial army in order to prevent her sick father from being forced to enlist as he has no male heir.

programme.title: Fantastic Four

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Mike and Sulley, two monsters, join Monsters University, in order to graduate as the scariest monsters on the planet. Starting off as arch-rivals, they gradually become best friends.

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: Tess and her daughter, Anna, do not get along. However, things take a turn when, in a freak incident, they switch bodies and are forced to live each others lives.
